title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 444.12 - Conditions for Approval of the Host Family Home Agency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 444.12 - Conditions for Approval of the Host Family Home Agency

State Regulations
(a) An Agency may
not operate a host family home program unless and until it receives the written
approval of OCFS. (b) An authorized
agency desiring to operate a host family home program must apply to OCFS for
authorization in a manner as required by OCFS, including, but not limited to, the provisions of Part 482 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
444.12

Adopted

New

York State Register December 8, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 49, eff. 12/8/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
